abstract: At more than $17 billion, Visa‘s initial public offering is expected to be the largest ever in the United States. Along with that comes a wealth of fees for the banks underwriting the credit-card giant’s offering — and a prominent voice is calling for a change in how those fees are doled out.
lead_paragraph: At more than $17 billion, Visa‘s initial public offering is expected to be the largest ever in the United States. Along with that comes a wealth of fees for the banks underwriting the credit-card giant’s offering — and a prominent voice is calling for a change in how those fees are doled out.

headline.main: Jackson Calls for Changes to Visa I.P.O.
